Alert Name: bush
Jeb Bush joins Tenet Healthcare board
Former Florida governor joins board of biggest publicly traded hospital company as it tries to recover from recent scandals.
04/12/07 01:30 PM, EDT
Former Florida Governor Jeb Bush, brother of President George W. Bush, will join the board of Tenet Healthcare, the biggest publicly traded hospital company said on Thursday.
FULL STORY
